Category:Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game

Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game is a roleplaying game published by Fantasy Flight Games, and the fourth in a series of cross-compatible roleplaying systems in production under their license to create Star Wars games. Unlike the prior three, however, it is completely standalone. It was released in August of 2016. As indicated by the name, it focuses on the characters and factions from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. It is followed by the downloadable adventure A Call for Heroes.
